jobDescription: As a graphic designer at GHI Company, you will be responsible for creating visual concepts and designs for a variety of print and digital media. You will work with clients to understand their design needs and deliver high-quality design solutions.

educationReq: Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design or related field
experience: 2+ years of experience in graphic design
